attributes.action: put "Withnail and I" on the list of  compulsory vidoes for all British schools
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The department of education should all the classic  British cult film "Withnail and I" to be seen by all children to teach them about culture, drinking, travel, hisory, and music. All children should be made to enjoy this classic British movie, which should encourage future film writers and directors.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
